meanings.definition: Small dumplings filled with meat or vegetables, typically served in soup or fried.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat wontons in my soup for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant serves delicious wontons in their special soup.
meanings.sent3: When the wontons jumped into the hot soup, they shouted, 'Weee!'
meanings.sent4: The wontons in the soup were like little surprises waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly cooked wontons filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: My mom made a tasty wontons dish for our family dinner.
meanings.sent2: The wontons dish at the party was a big hit with everyone.
meanings.sent3: The wontons in the dish were so excited to be together.
meanings.sent4: The wontons dish was a colorful masterpiece on the table.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the wontons dish danced on my taste buds.
